snippet.title: [PSX] Miracle World (ミラクルワールド 不思議の国のIQ迷路) - Full Playthrough (No Miss / Wrong Answer)
snippet.description:
After beating the game, selecting to continue will put you through the same sequence as before. However, the opponent will have higher threshold of points so you have less room to make mistakes.

* Fun fact: the interlude when starting a new game actually desynced pretty bad; I had to edit the video in order to match the timing. Among hundreds of PSX games that I've ever played, this is my first time watching a desynced video in the game. No error in any other segments. When continuing the game, the interlude when new opponents were introduced was not desynced as well; only in the new game segment that the error happened.


0:00 Opening
0:43 Main Menu
0:52 New Game Interlude
4:20 間違いを探せ！ (Spot the Difference!)
5:09 早押しクイズ (Quick Response Quiz)
6:54 ？文字クイズ (Question Mark Character Quiz)
7:17 記憶力を試せ！ (Test Your Memory) (Cutscene)
8:20 記憶力を試せ！ (Test Your Memory)
10:31 虫食いジグソー (Worm-eaten Jigsaw)
11:28 Ending
